title: SRAM Patent for Chainring-Integrated AXS Front Derailleur Hints at Shifting Revolution to Come
content:
Is SRAM about to revolutionize shifting again? The juggernaut drivetrain manufacturer has just been granted a patent on a chainring-coupled front shift mechanism that could improve aerodynamics of 2x equipped bikes, and allow for wild new frame designs.

Read the full article at SRAM Patent for Chainring-Integrated AXS Front Derailleur Hints at Shifting Revolution to Come on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
